name: Ana Lucia Varbanescu
content: Dr. ir. A.L. (Ana) Varbanescu - University of Amsterdam Dr. ir. A.L. (Ana) Varbanescu Faculty of Science Informatics Institute Photographer: Siesja Kamphuis Visiting address Science Park 900 Postal address Postbus 94323 1090 GH Amsterdam Contact details A.L.Varbanescu@uva.nl my CV This is the most recent version of my CV ... I am trying to keep pace, but it's not always up to date. Email me if you need the latest greatest version. Enjoy!
